pageTitle: Yates Big Wall Harness - Mountain Tools
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {2148=On or off El Cap, the 5.5" wide double thick PolarPlus padded BIG WALL swami provides maximum support and security. New is double laminate foam insert support panel at the small of your back and also "HypurCell" pelvic pads on both hips. Unique multiple wrap web closure and security buckle runner is rated to 4000 lb and stays out of the way - for lie backing or bending over at the waist. Leg loops are 3.5" brushed Polyester web filled with micro cellular porus foam - guaranteed to never sag, bag or flatten out - and are semi-adjustable to attain a perfect fit for all clothing combos. 2000 lb rated haul loop, a hammer holster and more gear racking than you'll know what to do with. A great harness for big guys, hanging belays or rescue work. Avail MD-XX (suggest the SHIELD harness for SM). Custom sizes available for 10% surcharge. Ask for FREE locking carabiner when placing your order.}
textAfterTable: Yates BIG WALL CLIMBING HARNESS On or off El Cap, the 5.5" wide double thick PolarPlus padded BIG WALL swami provides maximum support and security. New is double laminate foam insert support panel at the small of your back and also "HypurCell" pelvic pads on both hips. Unique multiple wrap web closure and security buckle runner is rated to 4000 lb and stays out of the way - for lie backing or bending over at the waist. Leg loops are 3.5" brushed Polyester web filled with micro cellular porus foam - guaranteed to never sag, bag or flatten out - and are semi-adjustable to attain a perfect fit for all clothing combos. 2000 lb rated haul loop, a hammer holster and more gear racking than you'll know what to do with. A great harness for big guys, hanging belays or rescue work. Avail MD-XX (suggest the SHIELD harness for SM). Custom sizes available for 10% surcharge. Ask for FREE locking carabiner when placing your order. wt: 34 oz color: black w/ contrasting trim size: M-XXL (see size chart) price: $159.00
